name: Mirror Drop
description: Mirror Drop is a psychedelic 3D puzzle game where you maneuver a reflective sphere in a world full of mirrors, over-saturated colors, and infinities. Each level contains three puzzles and a hidden exit, set against 100% raytraced alien geometry.<br/><br/><ul><li>25 levels<br/></li><li>3+ hours of content<br/></li><li>3 save slots (auto-saves after each level)</li></ul>
